name.baseName: Shale gas production;Site preparation stage;Road repair&construction
页岩气生产;场地准备阶段;道路维修和建设

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: The described industrial process pertains to the site preparation stage for the extraction of shale gas, which includes road repair and construction activities. The data set is specifically used for life cycle assessment calculations in the context of China's shale gas extraction, which is concentrated in the Sichuan and Chongqing regions. This process data can be applied to environmental impact assessments, policy-making, and optimization of shale gas extraction projects within these locales.
所描述的工业过程属于页岩气开采的场地准备阶段，包括道路维修和施工活动。数据集专门用于中国四川和重庆地区集中的页岩气开采的生命周期评估计算。这些过程数据可以应用于环境影响评估、政策制定和这些地区页岩气开采项目的优化。

time.common:timeRepresentativenessDescription: 原始数据时间介于2014-2016之间

locationOfOperationSupplyOrProduction.descriptionOfRestrictions: China's shale gas extraction work is currently concentrated in the Sichuan and Chongqing areas, and the data from Sichuan and Chongqing are selected for LCA calculations.
我国页岩气开采工作目前集中在四川及重庆地区，选取四川及重庆的数据进行LCA计算。

technology.technologicalApplicability: The described industrial process pertains to the site preparation stage for the extraction of shale gas, which includes road repair and construction activities. The data set is specifically used for life cycle assessment calculations in the context of China's shale gas extraction, which is concentrated in the Sichuan and Chongqing regions. This process data can be applied to environmental impact assessments, policy-making, and optimization of shale gas extraction projects within these locales.
所描述的工业过程属于页岩气开采的场地准备阶段，包括道路维修和施工活动。数据集专门用于中国四川和重庆地区集中的页岩气开采的生命周期评估计算。这些过程数据可以应用于环境影响评估、政策制定和这些地区页岩气开采项目的优化。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: Wang, J., Liu, M., McLellan, B. C., Tang, X. & Feng, L. Environmental impacts of shale gas development in China: A hybrid life cycle analysis. Resources, Conservation and Recycling 120, 38–45 (2017).
Wang, J., Liu, M., McLellan, B. C., Tang, X. & Feng, L. Environmental impacts of shale gas development in China: A hybrid life cycle analysis. Resources, Conservation and Recycling 120, 38–45 (2017).

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: When utilizing this data set for LCA calculations, it is important to ensure the geographic scope of the study matches the data provided, as they are representative of the Sichuan and Chongqing areas. The raw data time frame between 2014-2016 should be considered; thus, any significant changes in technology, regulations, or site conditions post-2016 may necessitate an update of the data. The black-box unit process approach used here may require additional data for the full transparency of inputs and outputs if used for detailed environmental impact analyses. Consideration of technological applicability and potential need for region-specific calibration should be made.
在使用这个数据集进行LCA计算时，重要的是确保研究的地理范围与所提供的数据相匹配，因为这些数据是四川和重庆地区的代表性数据。原始数据的时间范围在2014-2016年之间，因此，2016年之后技术、规章或现场条件的任何重大变化都可能需要更新数据。此处使用的黑箱单元过程方法如果用于详细的环境影响分析，则可能需要额外的数据来完全透明化输入和输出。应考虑技术适应性和可能需要的区域特定校准。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: 场地准备阶段--道路维修所用碎石
场地准备阶段--道路维修和施工所用设备及碎石等运输
场地准备阶段--道路维修及新建道路的长度
